infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to record videos.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone to record audio with videos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photo library to save and view videos.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera to record videos.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your microphone to record audio with videos.
